attributes.action: make the assessment process of Direct Payment self assessment nationwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a partner in policy making i am aware that there are certain councils in the land that use self assessment, this should be a nationwide process, saving money in the long run to social services and not having endless assessments, because they do not believe you. By doing this it means people are not rushed and are not being judged by Social Workers who are not very interested or do not know what Direct Payment is all about
